title: Is this chat log toxic ?
body:
Game 1
PlankGang4Lyfe: rengar no flash
PlankGang4Lyfe: got to lane late
PlankGang4Lyfe: i will recover
PlankGang4Lyfe: i need a gank top
PlankGang4Lyfe: got to lane late and he snowballed off it
PlankGang4Lyfe: ?
PlankGang4Lyfe: IM DONE
PlankGang4Lyfe: will jarvan ever gank?>
PlankGang4Lyfe: the one game im not carrying him he cant gank for me
PlankGang4Lyfe: are u retarded
PlankGang4Lyfe: if u would of ganked just now he would of died
PlankGang4Lyfe: he's diving me
PlankGang4Lyfe: and ur ult does what?
PlankGang4Lyfe: lmao
PlankGang4Lyfe: just help other lanes at this point jarvan
PlankGang4Lyfe: WOW!
PlankGang4Lyfe: YOU TOOK MY LIFESTYLE
PlankGang4Lyfe: THANK YOU
PlankGang4Lyfe: LIFESTEAL
PlankGang4Lyfe: THANK YOU
PlankGang4Lyfe: GOOD
PlankGang4Lyfe: he's pushing so i can farm now
PlankGang4Lyfe: thank god
PlankGang4Lyfe: can u guys communicate?
PlankGang4Lyfe: like ping or something at least?
PlankGang4Lyfe: dont fight
PlankGang4Lyfe: farming bot
PlankGang4Lyfe: i can 1v1 rengar now
PlankGang4Lyfe: not gonna try tho
PlankGang4Lyfe: i just 2v1ed got a kill
PlankGang4Lyfe: imagine if you ganked
PlankGang4Lyfe: now brand is afk cuz u guys dont communicate at all lol
PlankGang4Lyfe: just ff please
PlankGang4Lyfe: so u wanna draw it out for now reason/
PlankGang4Lyfe: its 4v5
PlankGang4Lyfe: no *
PlankGang4Lyfe: i can 2v1 and u guys make 0 picks lol
PlankGang4Lyfe: hahahahahahahh
PlankGang4Lyfe: what a trip
PlankGang4Lyfe: yes build damage 31 minutes in jarvan
PlankGang4Lyfe: when rengar is fed
PlankGang4Lyfe: cait if u wanna win u should get qss
PlankGang4Lyfe: or banshees
PlankGang4Lyfe: finally
PlankGang4Lyfe: its crazy how i went 0/7 in lane and outfarmed
PlankGang4Lyfe: malz
PlankGang4Lyfe: jarvan finally ganks
PlankGang4Lyfe: unfortunately it was in your base
PlankGang4Lyfe: lol gg
PlankGang4Lyfe: for what?
PlankGang4Lyfe: yeah me 2v1ing him and lee means nothing lol
PlankGang4Lyfe: report me for what?
PlankGang4Lyfe: being better then you after going 0/7
PlankGang4Lyfe: 2/14 yasuo
PlankGang4Lyfe: and i still did better after rengar rekted me in lane
PlankGang4Lyfe: lol
PlankGang4Lyfe: get gud
PlankGang4Lyfe: 75 gold pinks
PlankGang4Lyfe: any rebutals ?
PlankGang4Lyfe: or however u speed it
PlankGang4Lyfe: spell
PlankGang4Lyfe: lol
PlankGang4Lyfe: lmfao what?
PlankGang4Lyfe: clicking pink ?
PlankGang4Lyfe: then click map?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Fourskin Gank,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xmvIesno,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-14T01:39:21.201+0000)
>
> Game 1
> PlankGang4Lyfe: IM DONE

Toxic.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: will jarvan ever gank?>

Mildly toxic.  Certainly passive aggressive.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: the one game im not carrying him he cant gank for me

Toxic.  Again passive aggressive.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: are u retarded

Extremely toxic.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: just help other lanes at this point jarvan

Toxic.  Negative.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: just ff please

Toxic. Negative.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: i can 2v1 and u guys make 0 picks lol

Mildly toxic. Negative

> PlankGang4Lyfe: yes build damage 31 minutes in jarvan
> PlankGang4Lyfe: when rengar is fed

Mildly toxic.  Sarcastic instead of constructive.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: and i still did better after rengar rekted me in lane

Toxic.  Creating contrasts between yourself and teammates creates inter-team tension instead of building team unity.

> PlankGang4Lyfe: get gud

Toxic.

This is somewhat toxic... I just had a toxic as hell Udyr. :( I said one thing to him. 'Gank Udyr'. Near the end of the game, he tells everyone to report me and my nami support (Who was silent all game) for being toxic. Stuff is unreeeaaal. Normals ftl... but ranked and draft is even worse as of late. People complaining to much that somethin' is OP or their champ is now so underpowered, etc. when they've just been making non-stop mistakes. x.x
P.S : I was getting trolled this game by a 3 man premade who would not communicate not even in pings,only to flame

Maybe it's chat ban, or they don't speak English.

Riot also put mute buttons in the game -- that means you can finish/win the game without talking.
Only talking you need to do be doing is GG at the end of the game :)

Nothing in there alone stands out as super toxic to me personally. That being said though however, I do agree with LegendaryLemur's analysis on the chat log in that there are a couple of points here and there where you are pretty negative in-game. While it's not the most toxic chat log I've seen, I'd still definitely punish it for sure though, but that's just me. Try to use this time to improve on your behavior and remember, if someone refuses to stop being a jerk/troll after you've asked them once or twice to stop then just mute and report them after the game instead of retaliating negatively against them. You can defend yourself as long as it's done in a respectful manner.

If you talk and someone gets offended or pretends they're offended then yes, it's considered toxic according to Riot.  

Moral of the story, don't talk in game.

I read through that log twice.  I didn't see anything "toxic" about it.  At least, nothing that, were I in charge, was worth a "Time to punish" type of thing.

Here are two etiquette rules you should adapt for yourself:
1.  If you have nothing nice to say, don't say anything.
2.  Don't talk in chat.  Period.
